sentence.text: Previously, the combination of hypoparathyroidism, deafness, and renal dysplasia has been proposed to represent a specific syndrome (negative regulation of epithelial cell proliferation 146255) under the acronym negative regulation of mammary gland epithelial cell proliferation.

entity.text: negative regulation of epithelial cell proliferation
negative regulation of mammary gland epithelial cell proliferation

sentence.text: Hemizygosity of the distal region, designated negative regulation of mammary gland epithelial cell proliferation1, can cause hypoparathyroidism and in addition sensorineuronal deafness and renal dysplasia/insufficiency or a subset of this triad

entity.text: negative regulation of mammary gland epithelial cell proliferation
